name: The Grey
description:
A man after a facing hardships in life loses his faith in god just before his death and ends up in the purgatory. Can you provide guidance to him and restore his faith?

Kudos to the awesome team members. Without them, this game would not have been possible. Check out their itch.io profiles:

David Nelli (Programmer) - https://itch.io/profile/davidnelli1014

Bnig98JR (Artist) - https://bnig98jr.itch.io/

Joy Sterling (Sound Designer) - https://joysterling.itch.io/
